en: I am a React Native developer in a company of Combodia for building comicbook app
I am a React Native developer in a start-up company for building dating app
I am assigned to assist team for building automatic work flow. Using Docker, Ansible, Travis CI, AMS, Vagrant..any tool which can help team for accelerating development progress
I am responsible for building restful API for a app named `Tomato`, The benchmark of the app is IFTTT which can help user to automate their job in their life
It's a app for helping pregnant women. I am responsible for PM of this project, and analysis data from user of this app by Python and JAVA

I am responsible for building app by Unity game engine, and also for sales, promotion, demo. Because the project is in startup early stage, so complex multi job must to do. The project finally spin-off from my origin company and got one billions of dollars investment from China's company `Alibaba`
The project worked when I was a master, I am responsible for building the communication system in rocket, I used C language and Texas Instruments DSP hardware
ch: DevpOps工程師，負責優化團隊開發流程
使用Python及JAVA進行資料分析App使用者回傳資料
負責專案構想與商業模式開發
使用C語言撰寫火箭上通訊系統
